mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM channel WHERE CRT_ID = #{userId}) AS channel_exists;

SELECT c.chnl_img_path, c.chnl_ttl, c.suber_cnt, c.chnl_intro, c.chnl_uri, c.CHNL_ID, CASE WHEN s.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isSubsed FROM user u INNER JOIN channel c ON u.user_id = c.crt_id LEFT JOIN subscription s ON #{userId} = s.user_id AND c.CHNL_ID = s.CHNL_ID WHERE u.user_id = #{profileUserId} ORDER BY c.CHNL_OPEN_DTM;

SELECT c.chnl_id, s.ser_id, s.SER_TTL, p.POST_ID, p.POST_TTL, p.POST_SB_TTL, p.POST_REP_CNT,p.POST_INQR_CNT, p.POST_LIK_CNT, p.POST_PBLC_DTM, p.POST_THUMN_PATH, u.USER_IMG_PATH, u.NIC FROM post p INNER JOIN channel c ON p.CHNL_ID = c.CHNL_ID LEFT JOIN series s ON p.SER_ID = s.SER_ID INNER JOIN user u ON c.CRT_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE c.CRT_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY p.POST_PBLC_DTM DESC LIMIT #{offset}, 5;

SELECT s.ser_thumn_path, s.ser_ttl, s.ser_desc, s.ser_inqr_cnt, s.ser_lik_cnt, s.ser_rep_cnt, s.ser_post_cnt, s.SER_ID, u.NIC FROM series s LEFT JOIN channel c on s.chnl_id = c.chnl_id INNER JOIN user u ON c.CRT_ID = u.USER_ID where c.crt_id = #{userId} ORDER BY s.ser_open_dtm LIMIT #{offset}, 5;
